Trustee_13.name: Emma Dubois
Trustee_13.content: During the investment process, I demonstrated strong trustworthiness by proposing a fair allocation plan prioritizing the investor's benefit. I consistently communicated with Mateo Garcia and successfully distributed the profits according to our agreement, reinforcing my reputation as a cooperative and reliable trustee. This positive interaction is likely to enhance my reputation among current and potential investors.

Investor_19.name: Mateo Garcia
Investor_19.content: Although this was Mateo's first investment interaction, he displayed a commendable level of trust and collaboration by committing his resources and engaging transparently in the profit-sharing model. His proactive approach and willingness to work towards mutual success indicate a strong foundation for a positive reputation moving forward.
